(US recon) the process of getting information about enemy forces or positions by sending out small groups of soldiers or by using aircraft, etc.: He sent three men on a recce.
the process of visiting and quickly looking around a place in order to find out information about it: He did a little recce of the area before picking a spot to wait with his camera.
